result.arabic_text: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَشۡرِي نَفۡسَهُ ٱبۡتِغَآءَ مَرۡضَاتِ ٱللَّهِۚ وَٱللَّهُ رَءُوفُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ
result.translation: 207. Sinaamak (moominiin kinnuk) tu sinni Nafsi Yallih kacanuu kee kay leedah guranah xaama mari yan, Yalli isi Naqoosa moominiinih xuwaw-li kinni Addunyaay Akeeral.
